CustomField.description: To activate auto-save during periods of inactivity, input a duration in seconds greater than 0. Please be aware that the system also automatically saves survey participants' responses on next/previous/submit navigation button clicks.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To activate auto-save during periods of inactivity, input a duration in seconds greater than 0. Please be aware that the system also automatically saves survey participants' responses on next/previous/submit navigation button clicks.
CustomField.label: Auto-Save Inactivity Period
